article.title: Kongsberg Supports Remotely Operated Weapon Station
article.text: Kongsberg Defence & Aerospace, Kongsberg, Norway, was awarded a $29,702,000 modification (P00079) to contract W15QKN-12-C-0103 for depot support for the Common Remotely Operated Weapon Station. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
